title: Hello All!
author: Saurav Hathi
content:
Hey Everyone! *My blog is better than Dave's.*

You may know me from my other blog, "No Sleep Till Deployment", which is all about my life as a senior developer at a large tech company.

title: My First Post, Yo!
author: Saurav Hathi
content: Welcome to My Blog. *It's a beautiful thing.* I hope you'll have as much fun reading my posts as I have writing them. Well, before we go any further, allow me to introduce myself. I'm Dave Jones. I'm 34, and from Montreal, Canada.
